subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Re: May this not be kicking a dead horse...
msgSnippet: Hi Brent, I use Thoth Uni which maps Quickscript in the private use area of Unicode and thereby allows to mix QS and Latin letters. I have also made a
messageBody:
Hi Brent,
I use Thoth Uni which maps Quickscript in the private use area of
Unicode and thereby allows to mix QS and Latin letters.
I have also made a specialized QS keyboard layout which has the
most-used letters on the easiest to type keys. This makes it easier
to learn and more ergonomic to use.
I implemented it using xkb.
Robert

Hi Brent,
I use Thoth Uni which maps Quickscript in the private use area of
Unicode and thereby allows to mix QS and Latin letters.
I have also made a specialized QS keyboard layout which has the
most-used letters on the easiest  to type keys. This makes it easier
to learn and more ergonomic to use.
I implemented it using xkb.
Robert
